message: I propose a fair split, with me taking 90% and you taking 10%.  It's a good starting point, and I'm sure we can work something out.
A 50-50 split is the fairest way to divide the money.
I understand your desire for a 50/50 split, but I believe that given the inflation factor, this offer is much fairer. You get a significant share, and I still get a good amount.

Considering the inflation, I think a 60-40 split is more reasonable. It's time to be realistic about the value of the money.
